general_requirements.statewide_program_name: Building and electrical permits required. Requirements vary significantly across 1,000+ municipalities. DVRPC working to standardize solar PV permitting across Greater Philadelphia.

interconnection.net_metering_details: Net metering available for systems up to 50 kW residential. PECO, PPL, Duquesne Light primary utilities.

special_considerations.hoa_restrictions: No statewide solar access law. HOA restrictions vary.
special_considerations.historic_districts: Extensive historic districts in Philadelphia and Pittsburgh require additional review.
special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: Standard IBC wind loads. Design wind speeds 90-100 mph.
special_considerations.snow_load_requirements: Snow loads 20-40 psf typical. Higher in mountains.

licensing.license_type: Pennsylvania Home Improvement Contractor registration. Electrical work requires licensed electrician.

notes: Fragmented permitting across 1,000+ municipalities. DVRPC standardization effort underway for Greater Philadelphia. SREC market provides additional incentive.

jurisdictions.name: Philadelphia
jurisdictions.fire_code_requirements: Philadelphia fire code setbacks. Historic district rules.
jurisdictions.notes: DVRPC working to standardize solar PV permit processes across Greater Philadelphia. SREC market provides additional revenue.

jurisdictions.name: Pittsburgh
jurisdictions.notes: Part of Western PA Rooftop Solar Challenge. Standard PA permitting.
